data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 12,011 believers in Narsimhapur against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Narsimhapur, Madhya Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Narsimhapur.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.section_summary: On average, 88 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Narsimhapur, Madhya Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Narsimhapur, Madhya Pradesh, India.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Narsimhapur, Madhya Pradesh, India to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Kir (Muslim traditions) people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the county of Narsimhapur. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Narsimhapur access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.section_summary:
the county of Narsimhapur, Madhya Pradesh, India has a population of 1,091,900.

We estimate Narsimhapur has 12,011 people who might know Jesus, 13,248 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,066,641 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Narsimhapur, Madhya Pradesh, India. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
